articles.title: Russia muscles in on Indian oil market at expense of OPEC titans - Moneycontrol

Watch out Iraq and Saudi Arabia, Russia is making huge inroads into the Indian oil market and has quite possibly become the largest supplier to the giant Asian buyer.

articles.description: Chairman of Shapoorji Pallonji Group, Pallonji Mistry, the man behind iconic buildings in Mumbai and around, passed away on June 28 at the age of 93.
